member.name: CMSGHDR
member.summary: The CMSGHDR structure defines the header for a control data object that is associated with a datagram.

summary.para: The number of bytes from the beginning of the CMSGHDR structure to the end of the control data.
summary.div: Note The value of the cmsg_len member does not account for any padding that may follow the control data.

member.name: CMSGHDR.cmsg_level
member.summary: The protocol that originated the control information.

member.name: CMSGHDR.cmsg_type
member.summary: The protocol-specific type of control information.
